1.title: Project: Smaug
1.plot: Welcome to Craft Lab! In this episode, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana take on Smaug the Dragon from Peter Jackson's movie of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Hobbit. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

2.title: Project: Batmobile
2.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana fashion together Bruce Wayne's signature ride: The Batmobile. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

3.title: Project: Sonic the Hedgehog
3.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana piece together everyone's favorite hedgehog: Sonic! Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

4.title: Project: Owlbear Made of Chewing Gum!
4.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana stick together an Owlbear from Dungeons & Dragons! Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

5.title: Project: Captain America's Shield Made of Magic Cards
5.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make Marvel's Captain America's shield out of Magic: The Gathering cards. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

6.title: Project: Steampunk Groot
6.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make a Steampunk (Baby) Groot from Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

7.title: Project: Jelly Bean Majora's Mask
7.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make a jelly bean Majora's mask from Legend of Zelda! Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

8.title: Project: Soda Can Hunger Games' Mockingjay
8.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make a Hunger Game's Mockingjay pin entirely and completely only out of a soda can. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

9.title: Project: Tie Fighter Made out of a Human Voice (w/HuskyStarcraft)
9.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana are faced with a truly unconventional choice of materials, when the wheel forces them to make a Tie Fighter out of HuskyStarcraft's voice. Featuring HuskyStarcraft (aka Mike Lamond). Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

10.title: Project Floppy Disk K-9 from Doctor Who
10.plot: Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make a Doctor Who K-9 out of floppy disks. Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.

11.title: Project: Stick Direwolf Sigil
11.plot: In this episode of Craft Lab, Greg Aronowitz and Anna Akana make a Game of Thrones' Direwolf out of leaves and branches. Slight SPOILER ALERT! Hollywood production designer and geek Greg Aronowitz (Jurassic Park: Lost World, Terminator 2) is joined by host Anna Akana as they use unconventional materials to build works of art inspired from popular culture, selected by the audience.
